name: Ruiner of Shores
text:
When Ruiner of Shores enters the battlefield, each opponent discards X cards, where X is the number of flooded lands on the battlefield plus one.
Flood {2}{b}{b} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{b}{b} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)
Whenever you flood Ruiner of Shores, each opponent discards a card.
